Translations.Text: vebeda lehum seyyietu ma `amilu vehaka bihim ma kanu bihi yestehziun
vekile-lyevme nensakum kema nesitum likae yevmikum haza veme'vakum-nnaru vema lekum min nasirin
zalikum biennekumu-ttehaztum ayati-llahi huzuvev vegarratkumu-lhayatu-ddunya. felyevme la yuhracune minha vela hum yusta`tebun
ma halakne-ssemavati vel'arda vema beynehuma illa bilhakki veecelim musemma. vellezine keferu `amma unziru mu`ridun
kul era'eytum ma ted`une min duni-llahi eruni maza haleku mine-l'ardi em lehum sirkun fi-ssemavat. ituni bikitabim min kabli haza ev esaratim min `ilmin in kuntum sadikin
vemen edallu mimmey yed`u min duni-llahi mel la yestecibu lehu ila yevmi-lkiyameti vehum `an du`aihim gafilun
